meanings.definition: Opposed to or against sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: She had an antisex attitude towards relationships.
meanings.sent2: The antisex campaign aimed to promote abstinence.
meanings.sent3: The antisex club organized a movie night instead of a party.
meanings.sent4: His antisex stance was as firm as a brick wall.
meanings.sent5: The antisex message was loud and clear in the school assembly.

meanings.definition: A person who is against or opposed to sex.
meanings.sent1: As an antisex, he believed in celibacy.
meanings.sent2: The antisex spoke out against the adult entertainment industry.
meanings.sent3: The antisex activist protested outside the adult store.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as an antisex warrior fighting against promiscuity.
meanings.sent5: The antisex advocate was known for his strong convictions.
